title: ThunderWay Matte Black Single Pole Decorator Wall Light Switch, Decorative Paddle Rocker Switch Replacement, 15A 120/277V, UL Listed for Residential Grade Applications, 10 Pack

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #211,845 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #612 in Electrical Light Switches       #612 in Electrical Light Switches

shipping_info: FREE Thursday, June 12 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Light Switches
feature_bullets: Durable Construction:Matte finish provides a tough, scratch-resistant surface that can withstand daily wear and tear.The light switch will fit any standard wall box
Self-grounding clip: Designed with a self-grounding clip for automatic connection in a properly grounded metal wall box, ensuring safety and ease of use
Easy installation:Provide both quick push-in wiring and side wiring. Shallow back body leaves more space for wires in the box

Modern and Stylish Design: The sleek decorative appearance of the on/off paddle rocker switches enhances the look of any room, such as offices, schools, stores, shops, restaurants, public facilities, and hotels

Wide Compatibility: UL listed, compatible with tungsten, fluorescent, and resistive loads, this switch can handle a motor capacity of up to 80% of its rating, Suitable for residential use and most commercial areasthat require only 15 A switches

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Have installed about 20 of these so far and all have worked great.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These switches are well made with attention to detail. They are easy to install and they function very well. The decorator style looks nicer than regular flip switch. The price is reasonable for volume purchase.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This is a great value pack for updating the light switches in your home. I just bought a house and due to close at the end of this month. I love black accents and accessories and thought these would be perfect for the new house. Out with the white, in with the black. Black looks more modern and is cleaner. White shows dirt too well and if it stains from ink, grease, paint then there's not much I can do aside from swapping it for a new switch. I tend to use black switch covers as well so this will make everything look seamless. Easy to install and at less than 2 bucks per switch you really can't pass this one up.

customer_reviews.rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars4.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsThe switches are good
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: In the photo I show an example of one of the twelve switches that I used to control a ceiling fan. Since the fan has no light I only needed a single switch. The switch operates well. I have three more fans and some lights to do with the other switches. Just be careful with the mounting screws. They used some real cheap ones and they can strip real easy, especially if you install them in a plastic box which resists the screw turning more and more as you screw it in. I had to replace the original set on the first one switch that I used because they stripped so badly that I couldn't screw them in all the way. I stripped them with the Phillips head so I switched to the flat head and that also stripped the screws too. Didn't take much. The screws that came with the switches were much lighter than the ones I had lying around. Low quality metal. Not so much an issue in metal boxes that thread smoothly with little resistance. I took off one star for the subpar screws. Otherwise pretty god value for the set.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat replacement switches for me
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Glad was able to get so many at one time and 1 order.  They all worked just fine.  Very simple to install if know how to do basic electrical work.  They not only look good compared to my much older ones they replaced but they all work great to.  My older ones prob going on 25 plus years now def needed replacing.  Feels so nice to have a good solid switch again that isn’t so loose they turn on and off by barely a touch.  Also nice to replace the ones that were cracked.  So happy was able to find these in bulk as seen.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: As described and works very well. Very easy to install and for the set is great value.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: They say they are UL listed. They are affordable. They are black. That's all I needed!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: These are great for changing the color from standard white to black so they blend in well with the decorative covers I bought!
